meeting_info.organization: Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES, Council Briefing Room

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes of the February 26, 2024 meeting of the Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs.

agenda_items.title: City Council Feedback on Survey Related to City Manager Recruitment
agenda_items.description: Discussion on feedback regarding the survey related to the recruitment of a City Manager.

agenda_items.title: Template for Employee Survey Related to City Manager Recruitment
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the template for the employee survey related to the recruitment of a City Manager.

agenda_items.title: Timeline for City Manager Recruitment Consultant RFP
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the timeline for the Request for Proposals for the City Manager recruitment consultant.
